articles.author: Sergiu Gatlan
articles.title: Ivanti: Patch new Connect Secure auth bypass bug immediately - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Today, Ivanti warned of a new authentication bypass vulnerability impacting Connect Secure, Policy Secure, and ZTA gateways, urging admins to secure their appliances immediately.
articles.content:
Today, Ivanti warned of a new authentication bypass vulnerability impacting Connect Secure, Policy Secure, and ZTA gateways, urging admins to secure their appliances immediately.
